description: Lists all available node types that you can scale to from your cluster's current node type. When you use the UpdateCluster operation to scale your cluster, the value of the NodeType parameter must be one of the node types returned by this operation.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the cluster you want to scale. MemoryDB uses the cluster name to identify the current node type being used by this cluster, and from that to create a list of node types you can scale up to.

nested_items.name: ScaleUpNodeTypes
nested_items.description: A list node types which you can use to scale up your cluster.

nested_items.name: ScaleDownNodeTypes
nested_items.description: A list node types which you can use to scale down your cluster.
